response.overview: The Grammy Award winning Soweto Gospel Choir brings the Nelson Mandela Theatre to life with a soul stirring performance of their show African Spirit. The show, African Spirit, described as a wonderful spiritual journey, features a variety of songs about the upliftment and strength of the human spirit. Simply put the performance is a celebration of the Love and Life.
response.tagline: Recorded Live at The Nelson Mandela Theatre
response.title: Soweto Gospel Choir: African Spirit
